name: Head Tonight
description:
fcexb.com - @fcexb

WASD or Arrow Keys (full-screen to aviod scrolling).

A simple toy, made in Unity, concerning feelings of control, learning and experience. Built as an outlet and description of dissociation and anxiety.

I've been sitting on this for a while but still remember evenings when this experience exactly captured how I felt so I wanted to share it.

I'm at @FCExB if you want to talk about it.
